channel.title: Errant on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Errant on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 186
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 186 - BL-25/Bus. US-20/Bus. US-26/Bus. US-87/North Beverly Street/Bryan Stock Trail. US-20/US-26/US-87 join I-25 northbound. This is the southern end of the Casper business loop. The BL-25 shield has mistakenly been replaced with an I-25 shield.

item.title: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South - South Sioux City
item.description: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South - South Sioux City. This sign assembly is incorrect as it shows I-129 as I-29 and it also uses the state name of IOWA, even though it is placed inside of Nebraska.
